title: Human Interaction SFX
description: A collection of 496 ready to use voices.
longDescription:
Enhance your projects with the authentic touch of human emotion using the Human Interaction Sound Effects pack. Featuring 496 meticulously crafted individual sound effects, this collection is designed to bring life, personality, and realism to any scene. Whether you're developing a game, producing a film, or creating immersive experiences, these sounds will help convey the nuances of human interaction with exceptional clarity.


This pack also includes 15 unique phrases voiced by both male and female actors, offering versatility for any context. Phrases include everyday expressions like hello, wait, and thank you, as well as impactful cues such as stop, run, and no. From subtle grunts to joyful laughs, each sound has been expertly recorded to capture the full range of human emotion.


Bring your characters and environments to life with Human Interaction Sound Effects, perfect for elevating your sound design to a new level of realism.


Preview HERE
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 496

Number of Audio Cues: 496

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
